reviews.review_msg: Lectures are very dry. She could use powerpoints or ask the students questions to keep people from falling asleep.  discussions are lively. fair marker.  I am sad that she is retiring soon. tends to choose one or two students in each class and play favourites.  She does accept everyones point of view.  be careful of falling asleep in class.
Great prof. Can't complain. She's 64 and has tons of experience. Highly recommended.
Professor Heard is great at what he does. Classes are interesting and he's obviously knowledgeable. Also a nice guy with a good sense of humour.
Really nice guy, very knowledgable about South Asia (course was int'l relations of South Asia). Apparently some students enroll in his classes just to have him as their prof.
